name: Survival Instinct
description:
The Survival Instinct Game is the first game I ever made, 7 years ago. Ninja game is a physics based game, the player can walk, run, climb, and slide to survive the level.

Use the A, D to walk right and left, or  A, D + SHIFT to run right and left. W to jump, W+D to climb. SHIFT+S to slide. 

ENJOY
